welcome.welcome-text: As a graduate of a computer science programme, I am now looking for a job. As proof of my skills, take a look at this website, which I designed and developed.

services.title: Services
services.questions-desc: Find your answer on the following pages.

service-1.title: About Me
service-1.short-info: Who I am, where I'm from, what I like
service-1.desc: You want a few infos about me? Let me introduce myself!

service-2.title: Skills
service-2.short-info: Skills I have aquired during my studies and at work.
service-2.desc: Look at my skills. Very impressive, huh? Phasellus sit amet venenatis turpis. Suspendisse potenti. Vivamus eu sagittis lorem, eget pellentesque odio. Ut elementum nisi eu pharetra dictum.

info-1.title: Java / SpringBoot
info-1.desc: Java was one of the first things taught in my study programme. Since then, I have worked with various frameworks and acquired good knowledge, especially with SpringBoot.

info-2.title: Angular / TypeScript
info-2.desc: While Vue.js was the first high-level frontend-framework I worked with, I picked up Angular a while ago and got used to it quickly. Since then I used it for many projects and learned a lot.

info-3.title: Python / Flask / PyTorch
info-3.desc: Python was also taught as part of the course. The simplicity and flexibility of the language led me to work with it a lot. Among other things, in projects with microcontrollers with Micropython, for machine-learning with PyTorch or as a replacement for Springboot with Flask.

info-4.title: Scrum / Agile Methologies
info-4.desc: In the first major project of my studies, the basics of agile development were explained with scrum as an example. Since then, I have not known any other way of working in team projects.

info-5.title: Git / Jenkins / Atlassian
info-5.desc: Git is probably a given. But I am also familiar with technologies like Jenkins, Jira, Confluence and BitBucket.

service-3.title: Hobbys
service-3.desc: Working on tech projects can be fun, but everyone needs some kind of balance.

info-1.title: Cycling / Bikepacking
info-1.desc: I love cycling and prefer to use my gravel bike for multi-day bikepacking tours. With a tent and a gas cooker in my luggage, I explore Germany under my own steam.

info-2.title: Tennis / Squash / Basketball
info-2.desc: Without great ambitions, I like to play tennis and squash occasionally. With little success, I also like to play basketball in the summer.

info-3.title: Guitar / Piano
info-3.desc: Seit einigen Jahren lerne ich autodidaktisch das Gitarren und Klavier spielen. Da ich sehr unregelmäßig übe, ist mein Repertoire recht klein.

info-4.title: Gaming
info-4.desc: Being a software developer, gaming is of course also one of my hobbys. However, I usually prefer to be outside in nature.

contact.title: Contact
contact.question: Interest aroused or questions arisen?
contact.info: Do you have any questions? Please do not hesitate to contact us directly. Our team will come back to you within a matter of hours to help you.
